channel.title: Blast Pit security guard
channel.description:
In Blast Pit, after activating the fuel & power to ready the rocket engine I returned to the control room - only to notice the hiding security guard is missing.
[img]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/37497130781743283/6D769D1288D99371012954CBB485FC0DAD9C9E41/[/img]
Interesting enough, after killing off the tentacles the security guard came in through the door per script.
